Articles.Content:
The elected hill is full of election particles, so-called "electrons".

They say, electrons are negative, while happy people are positive.

A Positron village on the Electron Hill.

since the electron (light launch vehicle by rocket lab) is really small, i strap a spacex starship onto it and launch it on an escapse trojectory from earth.

i build a new hill

my hill

You didn't have a building permission.

His former hill for sale.

I reduce your mountain of paperwork to a mole hill.

My Hill.

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, ColdJ said:
> 
> 
> to a mole hill.
> 

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, ColdJ said:
> 
> 
> My Hill.
> 

You are a mole???

> 
> 
> 10 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> You are a mole???
> 

No, the mole is on retainer.

Still my hill.

The hill stands still.

Still Hill.

I grind the Still Hill.

Mill Still Hill.

The Mill is attached to a grill.

Grill Mill Still Hill

My Hill shake brings all the girls to the yard. I could teach you, but I'd have to charge.

Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

A ninja training center is opened on the top.

Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill
> 

I do love posts that make me laugh out loud. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I fill the hill with dill.

Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

Perseverance lands on top and starts drilling.

Now it's

Drill Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

I take the only Frill which was on the starship USS Defiant (she may have flaws, but she has teeth) and add it to the bunch.

Frill Drill Fill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill.

Then i take a sledgehammer and slap everything on the hill off, including claims to it. So that means...

My hill

I nuke it

because i am totally immune to radiation, relax and enjoy a chilled beverage on the remains of the hill

my hill 

Chill Frill Drill Fill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

Take a pill and get calm.

Pill Chill Frill Drill Fill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

**Edited <time datetime="2021-09-03T11:02:49Z" title="09/03/2021 11:02  AM" data-short="2 yr">September 3, 2021</time> by kerbiloid**

Everybody forgot the Dill and left it on the Sill

Sill Pill Chill Frill Drill Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

My Hill.

This achievement has improved everybody's skills.

Skill Sill Pill Chill Frill Drill Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

I fall ill, and then nobody likes the -ill ending things like still frill kill hill.

My hill

The hill got ill, too.

Ill Skill Sill Pill Chill Frill Drill Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

But yours

*[snip]* 

Unfounded complaints make me *trill* in rage.

Trill Ill Skill Sill Pill Chill Frill Drill Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill.

Shrimps find the hill and live there.

Krill Trill Ill Skill Sill Pill Chill Frill Drill Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

You have no weapons but i have. I don a radiation suit and then take the hill forcibly.

My hill

My hill.

I flood the hill with fish.

Gill Krill Trill Ill Skill Sill Pill Chill Frill Drill Fill Dill Kill Bill Grill Mill Still Hill

**MY HILL.**
